alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Inland Wakulla; Lafayette; Leon; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 1:28PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Lafayette, northeastern Wakulla, Jefferson, Taylor, southeastern Leon and southern Madison Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 128 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woodville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Mayo, St. Marks, Perry, Crawfordville, Wakulla, Pinland, Cody, Shadeville, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Wakulla Springs, South City, Eight Mile Pond, Drifton, Scanlon, Foley, Bethel and Perry-Foley Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
